sentence.Network_en: A small, unobtrusive smile curved the cook's thin lips.

entry.tran: 呈弯曲状的;弧形的;曲线形的
entry.def: A curved object has the shape of a curve or has a smoothly bending surface.

means.word_mean: 1. not straight; having or marked by a curve or smoothly rounded bend;
